synopsis.text:
Out of the blue, Kurisu Makise's world turns upside down when her dear friend, Rintarou Okabe, inexplicably vanishes from existence. Set a year after the events of the Steins;Gate series, Okabe had finally found solace in a timeline where his friends could thrive, free from the deadly grasp of time travel. However, the residual effects of his temporal adventures begin to catch up with him, leading to his sudden disappearance.

In this desperate hour, only Kurisu retains the memory of Okabe, triggered by an intense feeling of déjà vu. Faced with a heart-wrenching dilemma, she must decide whether to heed Okabe's warnings about the perils of time travel or to cast caution aside to save the person she holds dear. As she grapples with her choices, Kurisu realizes that her decision will have profound implications on the past, present, and future.

With the stakes higher than ever, Kurisu embarks on a daring quest to save Okabe, testing the limits of her scientific knowledge and the depths of her loyalty. Will she find a way to bring him back, or will she be forced to live in a world without the eccentric scientist who had once tried so hard to save her? Join Kurisu in this thrilling and emotional adventure that explores the intricacies of time travel and the unbreakable bonds of friendship.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
